text: Ann Sothern (January 22, 1909 - March 15, 2001) was an American movie, stage and television series actress. She starred in a lot of radio and television shows. She began her career in the late 1920s, and it lasted less than sixty years. She acted in the sitcoms Private Secretary (1953-58) and The Ann Sothern Show (1958-61). Sothern was born in North Dakota. She moved to Idaho after she retired from acting. She died in Idaho from heart failure. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from North Dakota Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:1909 births Category:2001 deaths
title: Ann Sothern
